akn:content.akn:p:
§ 4231. Definitions In this part:(1) Prize competitionThe term “prize competition” means the competition for the award of the Genius Prize for Save Our Seas Innovations established under section 4232 of this title.
(2) SecretaryThe term “Secretary” means the Secretary of Commerce.
(Pub. L. 116–224, title I, § 121, Dec. 18, 2020, 134 Stat. 1081.)
(1) Prize competition The term “prize competition” means the competition for the award of the Genius Prize for Save Our Seas Innovations established under section 4232 of this title.
